staffMember.name: Dave Soler
staffMember.description: My name is Dave Soler and along with my Boston Terrier, Franklin I've been creating software in the Philadelphia area for more than six years. I've created Android and iOS apps for teacher's and carpenter's unions, I developed a marketing website for a local farm, I've even written software for the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia to help analyze patient data. I've seen it all (the good and the bad) and am confident I can create software that solves your business' needs.

staffMember.name: Gillian Soler
staffMember.description: My name is Gillian Soler when I'm not exploring with my fluffy dog, Ping, I do my best to write things people like to read. Still here? Yay. I've been a digital content writer and strategist since 2012. Every social media account I made, every blog I started, every chance I could I would craft a colorful version of myself and the brands I worked for. I break rules, I have fun, I end sentences with prepositions and don't give a sh*t. I'll make your brand look baller and leave my sailor mouth at sea... unless you're into that sort of thing.
